mapper.select: select count(*) from mod_notes n left outer join mod_manager m on m.manager_id=n.sent_nickname where sent_nickname = m.manager_id order by n.send_date desc

select count(*) from mod_notes n left outer join mod_manager m on m.manager_id=n.sent_nickname where sent_nickname = m.manager_id and n.sent_nickname like '%'||#{searchUser}||'%' order by n.send_date desc

select a.*,r from (select aa.*,rownum r from (select * from mod_notes n left outer join mod_manager m on m.manager_id=n.sent_nickname where sent_nickname = m.manager_id order by n.send_date desc) aa order by send_date desc) a where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
